title: Reverse Transcription - C.gigas Lifestage Carryover Seed and Spat

yaml.author: Sam White
yaml.title: Reverse Transcription - C.gigas Lifestage Carryover Seed and Spat

markdown.markdown:
After isolating RNA [earlier today](../2024-03-19-RNA-Isolation---C.gigas-Lifestage-Carryover-Seed-and-Spat/index.qmd) (Notebook) for the [`project-gigas-carryover/lifestage_carryover`](../../../../project-gigas-carryover/lifestage_carryover/) (GitHub repo), I proceeded with reverse transcription for those samples with sufficient yields of RNA.

# MATERIALS & METHODS
Reverse transcription was run using 100ng of each sample, using M-MLV reverse transcriptase (Promega) and oligo dT primers (Promega), according to the [manufacturer's protocol](../../../../resources/protocols/Commercial_Protocols/Promega_MMLV_RT.pdf) (PDF). Oligo dT primers and M-MLV reverse transcriptase amounts were adjusted to maintain the proper ratio, relative to the amount of input RNA.

## Calculations:

- [20240319-cgig-carryover-spat-seed-cDNA-calcs](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b8Dh9winK2Q_3SVx-E1EnYkeyjDga3tWWNRCE_nEPmQ/edit?usp=sharing) (Google Sheet)

# RESULTS

cDNA was stored in the -20<sup>o</sup>C freezer in FTR 213.

Box layout:

- [Lifestage Carryover C.gigas cDNA Box 1](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dH1nrwITQwoYXUFSNx0-dHIjquq_Pde11pJ3Hz7K1Xc/edit#gid=1927399671)

![Box with blue label: "Lifestage Carryover, C.gigas cDNA Box #1"](20240319-cDNA-box.jpg){fig-alt="Box with blue label: Lifestage Carryover, C.gigas cDNA Box #1"}
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml:
# INTRO
After isolating RNA [earlier today](../2024-03-19-RNA-Isolation---C.gigas-Lifestage-Carryover-Seed-and-Spat/index.qmd) (Notebook) for the [`project-gigas-carryover/lifestage_carryover`](../../../../project-gigas-carryover/lifestage_carryover/) (GitHub repo), I proceeded with reverse transcription for those samples with sufficient yields of RNA.

# MATERIALS & METHODS
Reverse transcription was run using 100ng of each sample, using M-MLV reverse transcriptase (Promega) and oligo dT primers (Promega), according to the [manufacturer's protocol](../../../../resources/protocols/Commercial_Protocols/Promega_MMLV_RT.pdf) (PDF). Oligo dT primers and M-MLV reverse transcriptase amounts were adjusted to maintain the proper ratio, relative to the amount of input RNA.

## Calculations:

- [20240319-cgig-carryover-spat-seed-cDNA-calcs](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b8Dh9winK2Q_3SVx-E1EnYkeyjDga3tWWNRCE_nEPmQ/edit?usp=sharing) (Google Sheet)

# RESULTS

cDNA was stored in the -20<sup>o</sup>C freezer in FTR 213.

Box layout:

- [Lifestage Carryover C.gigas cDNA Box 1](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dH1nrwITQwoYXUFSNx0-dHIjquq_Pde11pJ3Hz7K1Xc/edit#gid=1927399671)

![Box with blue label: "Lifestage Carryover, C.gigas cDNA Box #1"](20240319-cDNA-box.jpg){fig-alt="Box with blue label: Lifestage Carryover, C.gigas cDNA Box #1"}
